plugin.name: ADE Manager
plugin.description:
The ADE Manager plugin allows extending a 3D City Database instance to store and manage CityGML Application Domain Extension (ADE) data.
  • Transform an ADE XML schema to a compact relational schema for use with the 3DCityDB
  • Generate a mapping file linking elements from the ADE XML schema with the relational schema
  • Register ADE extensions with your 3DCityDB
Documentation
Example 3DCityDB extension for the TestADE
